TopicTitle: [WIP] Kerbojet Systems - A B9 Expansion - USABLE PRERELEASE 0.1

Articles.Content:
Usable Prerelease 0.1

Early WIP prerelease - includes HL Tails and Supersonic Cockpit.

Requires B9

Requires DDSLoader

License: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0

DOWNLOAD (Dropbox)

WIP Parts

HL 12m Tails (View in 3D)

I wanted something a bit longer and rounder than B9's existing tails, so I made these. They're already in-game (screenshot), but the texture and cfg still need tweaking. Does anyone know how to calculate the volume and/or center of mass of a mesh?

HL Supersonic Cockpit (View in 3D)

B9's HL cockpit is great, but I wanted something a bit more streamlined for supersonic and hypersonic designs. The lower set of windows should provide good take-off/landing visibility, as well as provide a bit of a view of the lower deck from the pilot's seat. Current plan is for it to hold 8-10 kerbals: 4 on the upper deck and 4-6 on the lower deck.

JT8D (View in 3D)

A low-bypass turbofan loosely based on the P&W JT8D for subsonic and low supersonic applications. Shown with one thrust-reverser deployed.

Vernor Thrusters (View in 3D)

Multiple configurations for vernor thrusters - designed for large interplanetary vessels which need a lot of reaction control.

Mk2 Sized SABRE and Intake (View in 3D)

A Mk2 sized SABRE engine and air intake.

Edited November 9, 2014 by blowfish
This looks cool
That cockpit!
Oh, this is definitely nice, looking forward to your work (reallty curious about the HL supersonic cockpit).
Want, very much want!! I'll definitely be following this thread with interest!
This... This is a mod to watch.

I WANT THAT COCKPIT!!!

Btw, you don't need permission to do B9 stuff do you? Licenses always confuse me

Dat tail, tho...

Can't wait to see more of the cockpit! Looks good so far.

Side note, though... Is there any chance of making a HL Crew Tank? That's the one thing that can fully round out the B9 pack.

Just an FYI--Vernor is what Squad is calling the thruster because it's not a vernier thruster; a vernier is a type of thruster, Vernor is like Rockomax (a KSP name).

Drooling after that JT8D.

Thanks for all the encouragement. I'm hoping to get some of this into a releasable state soon. The cockpit might take a while though, mostly because IVAs are horrendously complicated (from what little I know about them).

Btw, you don't need permission to do B9 stuff do you? Licenses always confuse me

B9's license is CC BY-NC-SA, so as long as I release under the same license and provide credit, there's no issue . For what it's worth, everything's made from scratch, including the end texture on that tail...

Side note, though... Is there any chance of making a HL Crew Tank? That's the one thing that can fully round out the B9 pack.

It's on my to-do list if K3|Chris doesn't get to it first

Just an FYI--Vernor is what Squad is calling the thruster because it's not a vernier thruster; a vernier is a type of thruster, Vernor is like Rockomax (a KSP name).

I know. I might change the name at some point but for now I wanted it to match the name of the stock part.
Can you make an HL 12m Probe body? I never liked the fact there were only two probes in the B9 Pack.

Can you make an HL 12m Probe body? I never liked the fact there were only two probes in the B9 Pack.

Unfortunately, I'm going to have to say no to that. It might be a semi-useful thing to have, but I think there are better things to spend time on. I usually put all of the utility stuff (probe core, batteries, RCS, RTGs) in a cargo bay on my S2 and HL ships. You can also do what the stock B9 craft do and clip a probe core inside of a structural part. If you really need a probe core you can create a CFG to make one from one of the existing models (like the reaction wheel).

Meanwhile, quick forward visibility test on the HL Supersonic Cockpit (using dummy textures):

I will probably move the pilot's seat down and forward a bit, but it looks like visibility is good. Almost makes me think that the lower set of windows is unnecessary, though I may keep them just because they look cool.
Could you make a 12m "lowered" tail, along your raised and straight ones? That'd make for some really "Skylon-y" looking vehicles.

Could you make a 12m "lowered" tail, along your raised and straight ones? That'd make for some really "Skylon-y" looking vehicles.

Maybe at some point, but the actual front of the Skylon isn't lowered (see this diagram).
Slight update - I applied base colors to the supersonic cockpit and added a Mk2 sized SABRE and intake. Check OP for updated model
All these parts you are making- I want all of them!
Very clean looking, subscribed.
How's it going? I'd love some kind of test release, perhaps people could help you with figuring out the volumes... I really love the HL tails, BTW.

How's it going? I'd love some kind of test release, perhaps people could help you with figuring out the volumes... I really love the HL tails, BTW.

I'd like to provide a prerelease at some point. I just feel like I don't have all that much usable content yet. All that's really usable so far is the tails and (to an extent) the cockpit. But a lot of people seem to be asking, so I'll think about it.

Even if just 3 parts, it'd be an useful pack. I have a use in mind for both tails and cockpit.

Also, could you try doing more B9-style misc. parts? Stuff like 2.5m (Mk5) fuselages to better go with Mk.2 adapters and the Mk.5 cockpit, Mk.1 cargobay for small spaceplanes, perhaps other such handy parts...

Edited November 4, 2014 by Guest

I'd like to provide a prerelease at some point. I just feel like I don't have all that much usable content yet. All that's really usable so far is the tails and (to an extent) the cockpit. But a lot of people seem to be asking, so I'll think about it.

Adding in my 2 cents, it's not the quantity that's important, it's the quality. Quite a few of the folders in my GameData directory only contain a few parts, sometimes just one. And I mean that the original mod had WAY more parts than I end up using, so I got rid of the stuff I had no need for. So if you released this mod with "only" three parts, I'd have all three in my game that I use, as opposed to some others that had 50 or more parts to start with, but now I only have one or two in game.

So yes, please, by all means, I look forward to using these 3 items when they become available, and I hope that time comes very soon!

Later!

Okay. There are still a couple of things I want to clean up first but once they are done I'll provide a prerelease. The main holdouts right now are (1) Adding spectacular modulation (alpha channel) to the textures and (2) Adding a couple of props to the IVA to make it minimally usable. And rest assured I'm making progress toward those goals . There might still be issues with the cockpit's external ladders and RCS ports but I think those are fixed now.

Be advised, I will be requiring the DDS Loader plugin. You don't need to convert all of the textures in your KSP folder to DDS (though I highly recommend it - it saves a lot of loading time), but the plugin will need to be present as all of my textures will be in DDS format.

Also, I'm naming this mod Kerbojet Systems and will rename the thread in a day or two. Just a heads up
Prerelease is up (check OP). It's still very WIP, so expect issues, but let me know if anything looks outright wrong. It requires DDSLoader.
Um... Any chance that these will work with NEAR?

Um... Any chance that these will work with NEAR?

I haven't tested, but it should.
